title: Canyon Fever and Other Short Fishing Stories
features: Join Captain Frank Hardy and the crew of the Lucky in a riveting tale of encounters with sharks, porpoises, big-eyes, yellow-fins and other great offshore game fish in Canyon Fever. Many fishermen never get to the Northeast Atlantic Canyons and wonder what it’s like to fish there. Experience fishing the Canyon, a place where great fish truly live while also learning “how to’s” embedded by Author/Captain Dennis Dillon.Hired Hand, Captain Jerk and Unforgettable Striper are just a few of the tales in Other Fishing Stories of the Sea. These short stories depict fishing events in the lives of charter boat captains, commercial rod and reel pin-hookers, their families and friends. Although fictional, these tales by Captain Denny are based on his many years as a commercial pin-hooker and charter boat skipper.
description: "...sweet collection of short stories that will appeal most to fishermen.""...clearly an expert fisherman, and his love for and knowledge of his subject shines through with a warm, golden glow..." "...themes of kindness, generosity, and goodwill...should be relatable to all."--

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/81eGWqxhtWL._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Capt Denny C Dillon', 'about': ['Captain Denny Dillon is the principal owner/operator of the charter-boat Persuader II out of Point Judith, RI. He has been in the charter fishing business since 1972. In 1960 he moved from Providence to Narragansett to attend the University of Rhode Island. He has never left Narragansett. He calls it “God’s Country” and the waters off Point Judith, RI some of the richest fishing grounds in the world. When he is not fishing he is hanging with some of his seven children, fourteen grand-children and two great grand-children. Captain Denny is an avid sporting clays shooter and gardener. He believes deeply that Jesus Christ is his refuge and his strength.', "If you would like to contact Capt Denny he can be reached at captdenny@persuaderboat.com. Please visit Captain Denny's website at www.persuaderboat.com"]}
